Description: Fragment from rim of pottery mortarium with ribbed spool shaped handle. Very micaceous clay.
Bibliographic references: Villing 2006 / 'Drab Bowls' for Apollo: The Mortaria of Naukratis and Exchange in the Archaic Eastern Mediterranean (p.42 no.25)
Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. IV, no. 8)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GU.05)
